94136.「ここから 南東のジュレー島下層へ行き\n 東端のカヌーに乗って レーナム緑野へ:
From here, go southeast to Lower Jule Island, take a canoe at the east end and cross over to Lenam Fields, where you will find a building
called Prayer Inn. If you continue southeast along the road, you will reach Lane Village, where Weddie and his family live. If you have
never been there, you should go there.

94137.「こりゃどうも 旅のお方。\n あっしは エバンってぇ ケチな行商人でさあ。\n:
Hello there, traveler. I'm Eban, a penny-pinching peddler. Pleased to make your acquaintance.
My job is to carry goods from Julet to various places with this wagon. I'm going by Leen Village to the Beach Trading Post.
You have any business in those areas? If you do, I can give you a ride there.

94138.「これから 祈りの宿を経由して\n 海辺の交易所まで 行くんですが\n<br>\:
I'm on my way to the Beach Trading Post via
the Prayer Inn. If you want, I can give you a
ride.<bw_break>

94142.「ただし 送るだけで 迎えには行けやせん。\n それでも いいなら どこまで行き:
But I can only drop you off, not pick you up.
If you don't mind, where would you like to go?
<name_off><select>
Lane Village
Prayer Inn (Lenam Fields)

Beach Trading Post (Verinard South)
No rides

94143.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「まいど どうも:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Thank you very much. Well then, let's get
going!

94144.「おや。乗らないですかい。\n では乗りたくなったら また来ておくんなせい。:
Oh, well. You don't want to ride? Well, if you
want to ride, come back again.

94145.<pipipi_low>「おまっとさん！\n 祈りの宿に 着きやしたぜ。\n で:
<pipipi_low>Hey, guys! We've arrived at the Prayer Inn.
Now, if you'll excuse me.

94146.<pipipi_low>「おまっとさん！\n レーンの村に 着きやしたぜ。\n:
<pipipi_low>Hey, guys! We have arrived at Lane Village.
Now, if you'll excuse me.

94147.「おっと残念。金が足りないようですぜ。\n 金がある時に また来ておくんなせい。:
Oops, too bad. It seems we are short of money.
Come back when you have more money.

94148.「<%sL_TIMEI>まで\n 行くんですな。\n お代２５ゴールドで よろし:
You're going to <%sL_TIMEI>. 25 gold. Is that
all right with you?<yesno><break>

94149.「そうですかい。\n では乗りたくなったら また来ておくんなせい。:
I see. Well, if you ever want to ride again,
come back and see me.

116573.<pipipi_low>「おまっとさん！\n 浜辺の小屋に 着きやしたぜ。\n:
<pipipi_low>Hey, Mr. Omatto! We've arrived at the beach
hut. Now, if you'll excuse me.

127401.<pipipi_low>「おまっとさん！\n 海辺の交易所に 着きやしたぜ。\n:

Trading Post. Now, if you'll excuse me.

201054.「俺は～ ここら辺の 波を愛する\n フリーな 遊び人の船乗りなんだけど～！\n:
I'm a free gadabout sailor who loves the waves around here! I'm friends with the head of the play club! You know who that is? Play club!
It's a cool club where gadabouts get together and have all kinds of fun! And they asked me to bring anyone who might want to join the
play club... but I don't think I can bring you yet. I don't know... fun is kind of expensive, you know? I know you don't seem to have a lot
of money, so I only invite people who seem to have a certain amount of money to live on. You're saying I shouldn't judge people by
their looks? No, no, looks are important in gadabout! That's our policy! Whee~! Well~ But you're right~. If you reach level 50 in any of
the other locations, you'll be able to live a more comfortable life! So, in that case, I'll be looking forward to seeing you again! Whee~!

10228000.「ここは ラーディス王島行きの\n 渡し船乗り場ですぜ。女王様の統治のおかげで\:
This is the ferry pier to King Ladis Island. Thanks to the Queen's rule, it's free of charge, but I'm sorry to say that it's closed
for a bit now. Well, the Oar for rowing the ferry has gone somewhere. We are waiting for a replacement to arrive. I think it will take
some time, so please come back later. Oh, that's right. Have you been to Julet Town north of here yet? It's a good place to kill
some time.

35535.「オイラは 折れたオールのヤツを直してます。\n<br>\n「その間に あの娘っ:
I'm fixing Broken Oar's stuff. In the
meantime, would you go check on that little
girl, please, sir.

35536.「やあ お客さん。\n やっと オールが直ったところなんでさあ。\n<br>\n:
Hey there. I just got Oar fixed. How was the
little girl? Did she say she was going back to
town?<yesno><break>

35537.「そうですかい。そんなら いいんです。\n<br>\n「いやあ お手間を取らせま:
I see. If that's the case, it's all right.
Well, thank you for your time. Let's go to
King Ladis Island this time.

35538.「そうですかい。そんなら しかたない。\n しばらくすりゃあ 勝手に帰っていくで:
I see. Well, then, that's all right. After a while, they will go home on their own. Well, thank you for your time. Let's go to King
Ladis Island this time.
